trans-unit.source: Specifies that a list can be used as a data source.
A visual designer should use this attribute to determine whether to display a particular list in a data-binding picker.
This class cannot be inherited.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListBindableAttribute"></xref> class using a value to indicate whether the list is bindable.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list is bindable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListBindableAttribute"></xref> class using <xref href="System.ComponentModel.BindableSupport"></xref> to indicate whether the list is bindable.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.BindableSupport"></xref> that indicates whether the list is bindable.
Represents the default value for <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListBindableAttribute"></xref>.
Defaults to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListBindableAttribute>.
To be added.
Returns whether the object passed is equal to this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListBindableAttribute"></xref>.
The object to test equality with.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object passed is equal to this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListBindableAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListBindableAttribute"></xref>.
Returns whether <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListBindableAttribute.ListBindable*> is set to the default value.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListBindableAttribute.ListBindable*> is set to the default value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets whether the list is bindable.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list is bindable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Specifies that the list is not bindable.
This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
To be added.
Specifies that the list is bindable.
This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
This field is the default setting for this attribute.
To be added.
